a.n: The Art Farmer Quartet live In England

p.k: Art Farmer: Live in '64 highlights an amazing one-hour concert featuring the great flugelhornist in his prime.
p.d: Art Farmer: Live in '64 highlights an amazing one-hour concert featuring the great flugelhornist in his prime. Farmer's band includes legendary guitarist Jim Hall (fresh from Sonny Rollins' band), drummer Pete LaRoca, and Steve Swallow on bass. The legendary ensemble plays both standards and originals with ease and finesse and highlights why Farmer was considered one of the most innovative horn players in all of jazz.
